title: Medical Practical Competency Enhancement: University-Community Interaction Model Design and Benchmarking Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of higher education and community partnership fundamentals
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can explain collaboration system design plans between universities and local institutions by categorizing them into five core blocks (educational infrastructure, talent development, policy development, technical support, evaluation system).
By utilizing benchmarking methodology, participants can compare and analyze domestic and international best practices and propose field-applicable strategies.
Through project-based team activities, learners can develop education collaboration models tailored to local characteristics and establish implementation plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
